price: 2. Bobondela te sé Allah, ya soló nazali mokebisi mpe mopesi sango тропа bino.
arabic: أَلَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّنِي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ وَبَشِيرٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: allā taʿbudū illā al-laha innanī lakum min'hu nadhīrun wabashīrun
translations: and a bearer of glad tidings
